QUERY.TITLE: Ebola Epidemic in Zaire
QUERY.DESC: Find reports on preventive measures taken_after the outbreak of the Ebola epidemic in Zaire .
QUERY.NARR: In May 1995 , in the Zairian city of Kikwit , there was an outbreak of one of the most dreaded epidemics : the Ebola epidemic . Relevant documents report on measures taken_to prevent the spreading of this disease .
